translations.translation: simply because he possesses wealth and sons.
Simply because he possesses wealth and children.
(who so acts) simply because he has wealth and sons,
When Our revelations are recited to him,
Because he* has some wealth and sons. (Walid bin Mugaira, who cursed the Holy Prophet.)
(He was so) because he had wealth and children.
Because he possesses wealth and sons.
because he has wealth and sons.
It is because he is possessed of wealth and children
just because he has wealth and sons,
Because he is owner of riches and children.
—[who behaves in such a manner only] because he has wealth and children.
Because he possesses wealth and (numerous) sons.
(He was so) because he had wealth and children.
because he has wealth and sons.
Just because he has money and children.
Because he is a possessor of wealth and children,
[68:14] [only] because (an should be understood as li-an, ‘because’, and it is semantically connected to that [meaning] which it is indicating) he has wealth and sons.
(It is because he is possessed of wealth and children) He says: do not obey him even if he has wealth and children. This man had 9,000 measures of silver and ten children

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ومن كمال دناءته وخساسته { أَن كَانَ } أي: أنه كان { ذَا مَالٍ } عظيم { وَبَنِينَ } [القلم: 14] كثيرة مستحقة شكر المنعم المفضل، ولم يشكره
